Posts.Content: On Jan 10, 2010 4:18 AM heartsurvivor wrote: Hello, My name is Kimberly C. and I was dignosed with a lump on my breast a  few months ago , but after a biopsy  nothing was detected..   The other day i went back for a Mammo and A Ultersound  only to detect it might be back.       the dr has sugeested a Breast MRI, i have no clue waht that is and thought maybe some one could help...    I have a family history of Breast cancer  so my nerve are in shock again..   Thanks, heartsaver the ultrasound should show up the cancer.  My mamogram did not show it up.
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer infomation
